regen.absent_element: alert mechanism for executing functions beyond the permitted interaction level
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator if an attempt is made to execute functions beyond the permitted interaction level during Startup State.

regen.absent_element: alerting the operator when executing functions beyond the permitted interaction level
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator if functions are attempted beyond the permitted interaction level during startup.

regen.absent_element: Alert when executing beyond permitted interaction levels
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert the operator if attempts are made to execute functions beyond the permitted interaction levels.

label: The TCS shall inform the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function prohibited as a result of the determined level of interaction.
absence: Warning for execution of functions prohibited according to determined interaction levels
